content:
Sabhayaam priyaye snaanatthaal- naathhaa nee nirmmalayaakki.
Vandhyakkettam santathikall- vellllatthil ninnullavaayi.
Thittayil natta maratthinte- chottilavar sthhithi cheyyunnu.
Adimanukatthe bhanyjichu- srshdikalle veendiduvaanaayu
Svayamudbhoothan nandanane- vittoru nithyan thaathannum
Suthanum shuddhaathmaavinum- sthuthiyum vaazhtthuvum yogyam thaan.
